mapper.select: SELECT city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city_info_name as 'cityInfoName' FROM city_info WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%')

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', land.landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo', land.landmark_info_name as 'landmarkInfoName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN landmark_info as land ON city.city_info_no = land.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%') LIMIT #{moreView}, 10

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', eat.eatery_no as 'eateryNo', eat.eatery_name as 'eateryName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN eatery_info as eat ON city.city_info_no = eat.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%') LIMIT #{moreView}, 10

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', eve.event_info_name as 'eventInfoName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN event_info as eve ON city.city_info_no = eve.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%') LIMIT #{moreView}, 10

SELECT city.city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', city.city_info_do_name as 'cityInfoDoName', city.city_info_name as 'cityInfoName', stay.stay_info_no as 'stayInfoNo', stay.stay_info_name as 'stayInfoName' FROM city_info as city INNER JOIN stay_info as stay ON city.city_info_no = stay.city_info_no WHERE city_info_name LIKE CONCAT(#{search},'%') LIMIT #{moreView}, 10

SELECT landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo', landmark_info_name as 'landmarkInfoName', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', landmark_info_location as 'landmarkInfoLocation', landmark_info_homepage as 'landmarkInfoHomepage', landmark_info_summary as 'landmarkInfoSummary', landmark_info_langitude as 'landmarkInfoLangitude', landmark_info_latitude as 'landmarkInfoLatitude', landmark_info_image as 'landmarkInfoImage', landmark_info_fee as 'landmarkInfoFee' FROM landmark_info WHERE landmark_info_no = #{landmarkInfoNo}

SELECT eatery_no as 'eateryNo', eatery_name as 'eateryName', eatery_category as 'eateryCategory', city_info_no as 'cityInfoNo', eatery_summary as 'eaterySummary' FROM eatery_info WHERE eatery_no = #{eateryNo}

SELECT event_info_name as eventInfoName, city_info_no as cityInfoNo, event_info_venue as eventInfoVenue, event_info_start as eventInfoStart, event_info_end as eventInfoEnd, event_info_content as eventInfoContent, event_info_organizer as eventInfoOrganizer, event_info_contact as eventInfoContact, event_info_homepage as eventInfoHomepage, event_info_address as eventInfoAddress, event_info_reference_date as eventInfoReferenceDate FROM event_info WHERE event_info_name = #{eventInfoName}

SELECT stay_info_no as stayInfoNo, stay_info_name as stayInfoName, city_info_no as cityInfoNo, stay_info_homepage as stayInfoHomepage, stay_info_standard as stayInfoStandard, stay_info_deluxe as stayInfoDeluxe, stay_info_suite as stayInfoSuite FROM stay_info WHERE stay_info_no = #{stayInfoNo}
